Hi guys,

I'm new to Heritrix and I've been wanting to configure 1.14.3 to =
download text only.

I've gone to the user manual and also searched on the =
topic and I've found plenty of links to the post at

http://www.dreamersrea=
lm.net/~tree/blog/?s=3Dtext%2Fhtml&submit=3DGO

Unfortunately, navigating t=
o that page returns 404. Does anyone happen to have a backup copy of these =

Thanks

- Mark
